CompanyDescription: Evolving Systems provides real-time digital engagement solutions and services to more than 100 customers in over 65 countries worldwide. We have acquired multiple companies in the past few years that have ushered the company into the high value digital engagement space. Expanding our portfolio to now feature market-leading solutions and services for real-time analytics, customer acquisition and activation, customer value management and loyalty for the telecom industry promoting partnerships into retail and financial services. We have transitioned from offering traditional software technology licensing, focused on cost savings, to offering business solutions focused on revenue growth and efficiency gains for the carrier.  ...
